1) Civil Service Examination


Eligibility: Any degree from recognized university. Based on the community there are different age limits and different attempts.

 • Three stages of exam : Preliminary Examination - Objective Type (Qualifier)

 • Main Examination - Written Test

 • Interview / Personality Test

 Syllabus : Related to history,geography,economics,politics for 1st round and 2nd round is the test related to main individual subjects.

2) Engineering Services Examination(IES)


Eligibility : Should have an engineer degree. (Civil,Mech,Electrical and Electronics students allowed)

 Age limit : 21-30

 Pattern : Written and personality test.

3) IBPS PO


Pattern: Total mark of the exam is 200 and duration is 2 hours. There will be Negative Marking of 0.25 marks for each wrong answer.

 Syllabus: Logical reasoning,General awareness,English,Maths,Basic computer knowledge

 Age limit: 20-30

4)SBI PO

 Three levels

 1st round –quants ,logical,English

 2nd round_-objective and descriptive about English

 3rd –GD and interview

5)SSC CGL


Staff Selection exam


Tier-1 Syllabus: viz. English , Reasoning, Quantitative Aptitude and General Awareness.

Note: You can also Look for Other Govt exams like RBI grade B,LIC AAO,IBPS PO and SBI Clerk,Indian Railways which are not mentioned here.
